title: Rename in-app branding to PDF Vaulty

requirements.text: Update the app’s user-visible name/branding everywhere it appears in the frontend from “PDF Toolkit” to “PDF Vaulty”, including: document/page title, header brand text, logo alt text, and any home-page hero copy that currently says “PDF Toolkit”.

quotes: Rename this project to PDF Vaulty.
also change the app name as well please

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation/header brand displays “PDF Vaulty” and the logo image alt text is “PDF Vaulty”.
Homepage hero heading no longer contains “PDF Toolkit” and instead shows “PDF Vaulty”.
No remaining user-facing English strings display “PDF Toolkit” in the UI.

requirements.text: Update i18n translation strings so any English UI copy that currently contains the old app name “PDF Toolkit” is updated to “PDF Vaulty” while preserving existing translation key structure.

quotes: also change the app name as well please

acceptanceCriteria: In the English locale, i18n-provided strings that previously rendered “PDF Toolkit” now render “PDF Vaulty” (e.g., the Home hero highlighted word).
No broken/missing translation keys are introduced (no undefined/blank text where translations are used).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: No changes to PDF tool functionality, file upload behavior, or backend canister logic.
No new authentication providers or external integrations.
